Reverted [[Wikipedia:Vandalism|vandalism]] by [[Special:Contributions/130.159.248.222|130.159.248.222]] to last version by Maester mensch. Please do not compromise the integrity of pages.
/* Trivia */ Do not add any uncited trivia
/* Marriages */ Removed wiki links to Miyako Fujitani as she isn't that notable
/* Lord Steven */ Removed duplicate "Lord Steven section
/* Music */ Styling of ''Songs from the Crystal Cave''
/* Allegations of Sexual Harrassment */ Added citation needed tag
/* Retreat to video */ Added link [[Roger Ebert]]
Added source for [[Above the Law]] quote
/* 1990s: the Action Hero years */ Linked [[Michael Caine]], removed POV
/* Overview */ Talent doesn't need a wiki link
/* Filmography */ Finished converting all cited sources to reference notes
/* Lord Steven */ A Google search isn't the best reference for this, I think in that case it's better to give no reference at all
/* Children */ Removed forum link, not really suitable as reference material
/* Allegations of Sexual Harrassment */ Citation needed about the "penetrative, homophobic style of intimidation". What does it mean anyway?
/* Stuntman abuse controversy */ Took out two references, one only dealt briefly with the controversy, the other quoted the New York Times, but this was buried under a lot of other trivia
Converted plain links to reference links
/* Overview */ Removed POV bits in the o
/* Quotes */ Quote is already in the article
Re-wrote the introductory paragrah, giving a stronger basic description
not vandalism; this is his name on the IMDB
